testsuite.name: com.ultimateqa.testsuite.SignInPageTest
testsuite.system-out: Clicking on SignIn Link from Homepage [[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (bc3b0c668d9015a93e88265571a1b1d3)] -> xpath: //li[@class = 'header__nav-item header__nav-sign-in']/a] Enter email Manisha@gmail.com to email field [[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (bc3b0c668d9015a93e88265571a1b1d3)] -> id: user[email]] Enter password test123 to password field [[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (bc3b0c668d9015a93e88265571a1b1d3)] -> id: user[password]] Clicking on SignIn Button [[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (bc3b0c668d9015a93e88265571a1b1d3)] -> xpath: //button[contains(text(),'Sign in')]] Verify the error message ‘Invalid email or password.’ is displayed[[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (bc3b0c668d9015a93e88265571a1b1d3)] -> class name: form-error__list-item] Click to see screenshot Screenshot

Clicking on SignIn Link from Homepage [[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (20cb073c42f87a4ca7810dc3fb906625)] -> xpath: //li[@class = 'header__nav-item header__nav-sign-in']/a] Verify the text ‘Welcome Back!’ is displayed[[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (20cb073c42f87a4ca7810dc3fb906625)] -> xpath: //h2[contains(text(),'Welcome Back!')]] Click to see screenshot Screenshot
